extendedInfo.description: *:.ã.:*ãSimple fresh puzzle game ã*:.ã.:*  JewellerySky is a simple match-3 puzzle game. Everyone will enjoy it! Touch a jewel and remove it with finger. The jewel will be vanished if you put same mark jewels in same order. Increase your points by erasing more jewels!Furthermore, when a bonus jewel is erased, the jewels of all that line will be erased! Play the jewel and have fun! * How to play * - Touch and slide the jewel with finger to change its position.   You can erase 3 or more jewels by putting them on the same line!- Timer will starts after you touch the first jewel. The game ends when timer is 0.- There are some "Special" jewels:	Clock marked jewel - will reset the timer!	Thunder marked jewel - will erase all jewels on the same line!	Shinning jewel - will erase all jewel of the same color!- Get point by erasing jewels.- Make longer chain of jewels to get more points!The game has world ranking. Play and put your name on the global ranking!* Play Modes *Stage Mode:Clear a stage to go to the next stage. There are blocks arranged at the back side of the jewel marks.  Erase front jewels to break the back block. Drop items to the bottom.You need to break all blocks within certain number of tries to unlock the next stage! Take your challenge!Classic mode:In this mode, whenever it exceeds a fixed score, the level goes up. If the level goes up, the timer becomes quicker.upto what level can you continue? Take the challenge!Endless Mode:Continue play and erase the jewels until the timer becomes zero!This mode has world ranking!

reviews.title: Too many pop ups
reviews.comment: Fun game but to many pop ups makes it not so fun.
reviews.author: Randy Makin

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Can\'t stop playing!  I like the fact you don\'t have to start over at level one each time!
reviews.author: Sandra King

reviews.title: Really addictive
reviews.comment: Love this game had it 2days can\'t stop playing it graphics are gorgeous
reviews.author: Liz mills

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S Advance
reviews.comment: Is a nice and cute game.
reviews.author: Joshter Tan Tat Wen

reviews.title: Not free!
reviews.comment: Played for 2 mins then was asked to pay to continue!
reviews.author: Angie Dominic
